summary.label:
Learn Korean by speaking from the start!
Practice speaking essential Korean expressions in first-person POV scenarios.

===========

• "But I can just learn Korean by watching Kpop!?”

Just like if you were learning how to swim, you’d go into a pool instead of watching videos of Michael Phelps swimming. You can't learn Korean by listening to BTS or watching Crash Landing on You! Don't get us wrong, we too love listening to Kpop and watching Kdrama. But if your goal is to ACTUALLY SPEAK Korean, you have to, well – SPEAK! Teuida's first-person POV conversations will get you speaking everyday expressions in real-life scenarios.

• 3 min > 30 min

We believe that 3 minutes of actual speaking will help you more than 30 minutes watching someone else speak (long lecture videos).
Why waste your precious time learning about Korean when you can learn Korean by speaking it yourself? Our interactive lessons not only get you to speak with the tutors but gives instant feedback on your pronunciation.

• Overcome fear of speaking

Research shows that one of the greatest barriers to speaking a language is confidence. After all, what's the point of knowing all the grammar rules and verb conjugations if you can't speak when the moment comes? Teuida helps you overcome fear of speaking by simulating real-life scenarios but without all the social anxiety. (i.e. Our characters won't throw shade at you for mispronouncing!)

• What about those other apps?

Most apps out there are vocabulary-building games and will teach you a lot of new words and basic hangul. But if your goal is to actually speak Korean, then well let's face it... no amount of matching words with cute pictures will improve your speaking.

===========

Here’s a list of things that make Teuida different:

•  Essential expressions :

No more weird, awkward phrases (translated by bots) that no Korean people actually use in real life. (Let's be honest, when was the last time you had to say "I am a boy, you are a woman" in real-life?)

• Taught by Bilingual Tutors:

Our crazy selection of fully bilingual tutors not only speak Korean but understand where you’re coming from. They know exactly what to teach you because they've been in your shoes!

• AI Pronunciation Analysis:

What's the point of repeating sentences aloud if you can't tell whether you're pronouncing it right? Teuida has a convenient voice recognition system that will give instant feedback on your pronunciation.

• Fun, Interactive Stories:

We believe that learning and fun are not mutually exclusive. In fact, learning is most effective when it's fun! You'll find yourself laughing, screaming and at times even cringing with the characters.

• Real-life Scenarios:

Real-life everyday situations! Everything from ordering a drink at the cafe to talking to your KPOP bias. Okay, that last scenario isn't really an everyday situation. But hey! You never know! ;)

• Culture-specific tips:

A wise man once said that "the person who learns language without learning culture risks becoming a fluent fool". We believe understanding culture is the key to learning language. So we hand-selected each scenario to reflect the culture-specific elements of Korea.

So... what are you waiting for? Stop reading and start speaking with Teuida!

===========

Please note you will need a TEUIDA Premium plan in order to access all content and exclusive features.

title.label: Teuida: Learn Korean & Speak - TEUIDA

summary.label:
Dive into the heart of Bois Jacques on a unique immersive journey with the Easy Company thanks to Overlap Reality®, a technology developed by SkyBoy that enhances the effects of augmented reality.

During the Second World War, Bois Jacques, an historic site of the Battle of the Ardennes, was the scene of terrible battles between the American and German armies.

In December, 1944, Bastogne is situated on the route of the German Fifth Armoured Division. The Germans have a very clear plan, which involves taking the important crossroads that form Bastogne as quickly as possible and heading towards the river Meuse: the Panzer Lehr Division 130 must capture the town by surprise, while the Panzer Division 2 must bypass it and attack the Meuse. Meanwhile, the Volks-Grenadiere-Division 26 must attack the resistance pocket.

But the Americans on the ground and the reinforcements hastily sent in in trucks resist to defend the city! And on December 19, the 101st American Airborne Division comes to the rescue. However, The GIs are quickly surrounded.

It is in this context that, on December 20, 1944, the 2nd Battalion of the 506th Parachute Regiment, of which the famous Easy Company is a member (“Band of Brothers”), takes up position in Bois Jacques. It will remain there until the beginning of January, 1945, before giving way to other units of the 101st Airborne Division.

After fierce resistance to German attacks, the time comes for the American counter-attack in early January, 1945. In mid-January, the German army is still resisting fiercely but is seriously weakened: its supply is becoming increasingly complicated and its tanks run out of fuel. On January 28, 1945, the Battle of the Ardennes comes to an end. Its consequences prove decisive for the continuation of the conflict, and deal a fatal blow to Adolf Hitler’s ambitions.

Aware of the exceptional heritage character and historical value of this site, the City of Bastogne, IDELUX and INTERREG wished to promote it.

Using a dedicated mobile application, this particular digital project offers visitors of Bois Jacques the chance to be plunged into a series of six immersive, 360°, geo-localised videos, each lasting two to three minutes. Each audiovisual work, a true historical re-enactment, follows soldiers who belong to one of the Easy Company’s divisions, recounting a scene from their daily life of war, each spot being about a particular day and event.

Benjamin Brillaud, alias NOTA BENE, is the red thread of the journey but knows to regularly disappear so as to allow the spectator to enter into the heart of history, inviting them to put themselves in the soldiers' shoes.

This mobile application is funded by the INTERREG V A GRANDE REGION programme as part of the “Land of Memory” project. It is produced by SKY BOY on behalf of IDELUX Public Projects.

The application is available in French, English, Dutch and German.

How does it work?
 1/ Meet at Bois Jacques
 2/ Scan the QR code or connect to the "Bois Jacques" Wi-Fi
 3/ Download the application in the app-store of your smartphone
 4/ Launch the application to load the content
 5/ Place yourself on one of the points materialized by a target
 6/ At each point of interest, aim at the target and click on the screen to start the video

STUDYFLIX: DIE LERNAPP!
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

*** ÜBER 3.000 VIDEOS FÜR SCHÜLER, STUDENTEN UND AZUBIS ***

Unser Redaktionsteam bereitet die wichtigsten Themen für Schüler, Studenten und Azubis in hochwertigen Videos auf. So verstehst du jedes Thema in unter 5 Minuten.

*** MEHR ALS 20.000 LERNKARTEN ***

Wir überprüfen bei jedem Thema, was die klausurrelevanten Inhalte sind. Diese fassen wir zu Lernkarten zusammen und fügen weitere Beispiele hinzu – knapp und gut verständlich erklärt. So kann in der Klausur nichts schief gehen.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
HOL DIR DIE KOSTENLOSE STUDYFLIX APP!
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

*** KOMPLEXE THEMEN EINFACH VERSTEHEN ***

Jedes Thema wird von uns hochwertig animiert. Das Ergebnis: ein unterhaltsames Video, das dich in knapp fünf Minuten effizient auf deine nächste Prüfung vorbereitet. So lernst du am besten!

>>> Expertenteams für alle Themenbereiche.

*** SPEICHER DEINE FAVORITEN ***
Mit der Merken-Funktion behältst du die Übersicht über deine Lernmaterialien und kannst die besten Videos unter deinen Favoriten speichern. Dadurch können wir dir Videos vorschlagen, die andere Schüler und Studenten mit den gleichen Interessen gelernt haben.

>>> Behalte den Überblick mit der Merken-Funktion.
>>> Individuelle und relevante Empfehlungen für deine Klausur.
>>> Schau dich schlau in 5 Minuten.

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
STUDYFLIX – DEIN PARTNER FÜR SCHULE UND UNI
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

*** STUDYFLIX ***

Wir sind ein junges und dynamisches Startup aus Augsburg. Wir sind überzeugt, dass Lernen nicht langweilig oder gar teuer sein muss! Deshalb bieten wir dir hochwertige, animierte Lernvideos, mit denen Lernen Spaß macht – und das komplett kostenlos.
Dafür sind wir vor einigen Jahren mit unserer Lernplattform gestartet und haben mittlerweile über 3000 Videos für Schüler Studenten und Azubis.

*** GIB UNS FEEDBACK ***

Unser Ziel ist, das bestmögliche Lernerlebnis zu verbreiten – für Schule, Berufsschule und Universität.

Falls dir unsere Videos helfen, schreib uns eine positive Bewertung und gib uns 5 Sterne! Wenn du mehr zu Studyflix wissen willst, schau auch auf unserer Webseite vorbei:

>>> WEBSEITE: https://studyflix.de
>>> FEEDBACK: feedback@studyflix.de
